Articles.Content: Can you please make KSP support the workshop on Steam? It will be much easier for people to istal mods without getting virus on their comuter

Hi Andysand01, as KSP is not only available on Steam, but also from the Squad store, from GoG and from Amazon, it'd be unfair to these players to have addons on the Steam workshop.

Squad offers addon hosting via Curse which anyone can use, and Squad are glad to see that community efforts to provide addon hosting have been so successful.

There are also addon managers such as ckan, again produced by the excellent KSP community, which can download, install and update addons for all players, not only Steam players.

So there are no plans to subdivide the KSP fans by having addons on Steam workshop, sorry.

I don't think so:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest

Try ckan, it does the same
